name: tuesday.
description:
A visual novel made for Northeastern Game Jam 2022.

You're a freelance coder who stays in their apartment all the time and never leaves. Search inside your apartment to rediscover how much there is to live.

Trailer link: https://drive.google.com/file/d/1_y0wOVIFkVsCAzrhamj0ez6fxuagplpF/view?usp=shari...

Credits:

Taha Adams: art, lead, and game trailer

Miles Blumenau: programming

Dylan Li: composing and sound effects

Charlie Mazzei: narrative, animations, sound effects
